author: philip
msg: Tweak to make compatible with Python 2.1.3.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/update_tests.py
(obstructed_update_alters_wc_props): Don't use Python's file function.

author: ringstrom
msg: * STATUS: Nominate and vote for r14074.

author: ringstrom
msg: Two changes to make the 1.2 mailer.py backward compatible:
Keep the 1.1 command line for the propchange subcommand and add a new
propchange2 subcommand.  When using the old propchange subcommand, all
propchanges are treated as adds to match the behavior in 1.1.
Handle config files without the new [maps] section.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py
(main): Handle propchange and propchange2.
(PropChange.generate): Treat unknown actions as adds.
(Config.__init__): Create an empty maps section if none was found in
the config file.
(usage): Update, and clarify what ACTION is used for.
FILE SCOPE: Handle propchange and propchange2.

author: maxb
msg: Drop the Mandrake section from the packages page. The packages are offline
after their hosting server (mirror.brain.org) failed catastrophically. If they
ever reappear online, this commit can be reverted.
* www/project_packages.html: Delete Mandrake section.

author: maxb
msg: * www/project_packages.html:
Overhaul the Red Hat/Fedora, Debian, and SuSE sections.
